name: Paddling & Hiking Ontario's Southern Shield
description: Explore the southern part of Ontario's rugged shield country by boat and on foot. Each of these 22 wilderness day trips combines flatwater paddling and moderate hiking in equal measure. Each route includes a detailed map and instructions as well as colour photographs. Trips featured include Frontenac, Bon Echo, Algonquin and Killarney as well as some of the province's lesser-known parks.
